title: Service at sea in the marine police
creator_credit: Malayan Film Unit, B.H. Hipkins and D.S. Green
brief_description: A Malayan constable volunteers to join Malaya’s Maritime Police. After a period of seamanship training he is posted to a police launch operating in coastal waters. As a member of the crew he takes part in patrols searching for smugglers, gun-runners and other undesirables.
